1.content:
In this world, there are rumors of a secret organization that creates never seen before technology. They come in all sizes and have the ability to make fantasy characters real. However, the technology is rare and only a few people know about the organization, even fewer actually work for it. Though their goals are unclear, their technology has proven to be successful.

Nick, an incredibly intelligent scientist was one of the few that worked with the organization. One of his most critical jobs was to ensure the devices didn't fall into the wrong hands. However, that didn't stop him from delivering devices to people he trusted the most.

One Friday morning, Nick had decided to drop off a device to his friend's family. He rode in an ice cream truck that was owned by the company and stopped at the address. He left the box on the doorstep, leaving a message on the package that said "Have fun." Nick rang the doorbell and ran to his truck, driving away before anybody noticed him. A person inside started to wake up, hearing the doorbell.

Who is this person that will find the package?
1.title: A secret package

11.content:
Damon yawned as he climbed out of bed, looking at his clock to see the time was 9:30 AM. He was currently home alone as his older sister, Olivia, was currently at college and his mother, Rebecca, was currently at work

His mother was 47 years old with long brown hair and brown eyes. Rebecca was a bit playful and loved to write adventure stories. She had always imagined going on one herself. She loved her children a lot and loved to spend time with them in many ways. She protected and helped her children whenever she could.

Damon’s sister, Olivia, was 20 years old with short brown hair and blue eyes. She was hard working and did her best in school. Olivia liked to visit her family as she temporarily lived in the college dorms. She typically visited her family once every month.

Damon currently didn’t have school today so he got to stay home. He walked to the door and looked to see who rang the doorbell, only to find that nobody was there. However, he did find a mysterious package on the doorstep.

“Hm? Now what could this be?” Damon softly said to himself. He saw the note and didn’t think anything of it, bringing the package in. He put in on the table and unwrapped it, revealing a new green GameCube. Damon was excited and quickly plugged the device in. He wasn’t sure how to put games in it (as it didn’t look like it had an opening like a normal one) but he was excited to use it. Once it was plugged in and he turned it on, a sweet female voice started to speak.

“Greetings user. Congratulations on your new fantasy shrinking device. This version can make any Nintendo character appear at any size you wish. There is also a program to shrink yourself or others around you. Please select your choice user.” The device said. Damon was amazed, though had doubts it was correct. Still, he saw no harm in trying it out.

The first thing he was able to choose was which series he wanted to look at. After looking through his options, he chose…
11.title: Home alone with a new device

111.content:
Damon chose the Legend of Zelda. He always liked exploring the worlds and going through dungeons. When he chose it, the machine flipped to the next step.

“Please choose which game you would like the character to come from.” The female voice said again. The boy smiled and looked through more options before picking…
111.title: Choosing which game in the series

1112.content:
Damon chose Twilight Princess. There was some good characters there, and the game was beautiful. The screen then showed the actual characters that he could choose from.

“Please select the character you desire.” The female voice said. Damon looked carefully, knowing he was close to making someone appear, if this was legitimate. After a minute, Damon smiled and chose…
1112.title: Twilight Princess, a Game of Light and Shadow

choices: He wanted to treat her like a pet and take care of her
He wanted to show her around his place
He showed her the device and accidentally shrunk himself
He wanted to play a game with her
11123.content:
Damon chose the twilight princess herself. Midna was incredibly beautiful and (in his opinion) the best partner in the series. He chose her size to be 4 inches. He was also able to pick whether or not Midna got to keep her powers. After a minute of deciding, he chose to let her keep her teleportation and her floating abilities. He also gave her the ability to switch between her two forms at will.

Once he hit complete, the top of the machine opened, raising an antenna. It suddenly fired a beam at the floor, making Midna in her true form appear (currently unconscious). Once it was done, the antenna lowered back into the device and closed up. Damon was astonished that it worked. He carefully picked her up and looked at her. She looked just like how she did in the video game and was beautiful.

“I can’t believe it actually happened!” Damon said quietly. He took her to the kitchen and set her down on the table. He then started to make a PB&J for her. As he was doing so, thoughts ran through his head of the possibilities. He also had no idea how it was even possible, but he didn’t question science as it was probably a bad idea. He finished the sandwich and put it on the table. He then set Midna on the sandwich so she had a soft bed.

“Ngh…” Midna mumbled, starting to wake up. Damon smiled as the shrunken girl sat up rubbing her eyes. “Where…am I?” Midna asked. She looked up to suddenly notice the giant in front of her. Normally, someone would be afraid. However, Midna was different as she had faced the king of evil one on one before and had even almost died multiple times.

“Hello there, my name is Damon.” The giant said. Midna calmly stood up and stretched.

“Greetings, my name is Midna. Where did you take me, and why?” The twilight princess asked, not showing fear.

“This is my home. I brought you here so we could have fun and be friends. I even made you something to eat.” Damon said, gesturing to where she was standing. Midna frowned and started to get a little upset.

“If you wanted me to be your friend, why did you capture me and put me on the food? You want to eat me, don’t you!”

“No! I’m sorry, I put you there so you had food and a comfortable place to rest. Please, can we be friends?” Damon asked. Midna started at him for a second before sighing. She was able to tell he was being sincere.

“Alright, but tell me what exactly you are planning to do with me.” Midna said. Damon gave a warm smile.
11123.title: The princess of the twilight realm

114.content:
Damon decided to go with the Kirby series. He liked Kirby as he was very cute and the games were simple to play. After he chose the game, he was then able to choose which character. Damon quickly noticed he wasn’t limited to just video games, but also the Kirby anime (which he had enjoyed watching).

He scanned through the options before picking…
114.title: The world with the puffball

115.content: Which series did he choose?
115.title: More series

1153.content: Damon decided to choose Shantae’s series. The games were always fun and there were many characters to choose from. After carefully looking through them, he eventually chose…
1153.title: The series with genies and pirates

12.content:
Shadow groaned in bed when the doorbell rang. Today was his day off, and he had wanted to sleep in as it was only 7:30 AM. He got up and went to the door, not having any idea who it could be. He opened the door to see that nobody was there, but there was a package on the ground. Shadow picked it up and inspected it. The package didn’t say who it was for, or who it was from. There was only a simple vague note. Shadow shrugged and took it inside.

“I don’t know where this came from, but it’s mine now since I was forced to get up.” Shadow said, taking the package to his bedroom. He sat on the floor and unpacked it, revealing a green device inside. Shadow plugged it into his TV that was in his bedroom and turned it on, hoping to learn more about it.

“Greetings user. Congratulations on your new fantasy shrinking device. This version can make any Nintendo character appear at any size you wish. There is also a program to shrink yourself or others around you. Please select your choice user.” The console said on the screen. Shadow smiled at the screen. He had heard rumors about devices like this, though he had only assumed they were rumors.

“Hm, let’s see if this machine is telling the truth.” Shadow said, looking through the different series. He wasn’t sure if this was real or not, but he was willing to give it a shot. After a minute of looking, the series he chose was…
12.title: A creepy person with a powerful device

124.content:
Shadow chose Animal crossing because he thought game was peaceful and had good characters. Once he clicked on the option, it showed many characters that he could choose.

“Which one, which one,” Shadow thought. He smiled, looking st all of the good options. After a minute he chose…
124.title: A game full of animals

1243.content: After a minute of thinking, he decided he didn’t want a normal villager. Instead, he chose one of the special ones to bring to his world. As he looked through the new options, Shadow started to get excited before choosing…
1243.title: Bringing in a special visitor

12431.content: Shadow decided to go with the hard working secretary, Isabelle. He liked her because she was really popular and was quite attractive for a dog. Once he picked her, the machine gave him one more choice to make, what size would she be. He thought quite a bit before deciding…
12431.title: A loyal female dog

124313.content:
He decided 5 inches would be a good height for Isabelle. Once he selected it, the machine buzzed and raised an antenna out of the top. Before Shadow could react, it fired a beam that created a tiny unconscious Isabelle in front of him. The giant smiled as the machine turned off and went silent.

Shadow smiled as he picked the small dog up. She was cute and her size made him feel powerful. He softly rubbed her back with his finger to try and wake her up. Isabelle moaned and woke up. She stood up and looked around her, confused of what happened. When she noticed the grinning giant, she yelped and fell on her butt.

“Who are you!?” Isabelle asked. Shadow chuckled and laid down in his bed, still holding her.

“My name is Shadow. I saw how good of a secretary you were and decided to bring you here.” The giant said, placing her on his chest. Isabelle blushed at the comment and smiled.

“Oh, I just do what I was hired to do. I like helping out a lot.” The shrunken dog said.

“That’s good. You can help me out then. You see, I wanted a…”
124313.title: The world’s smallest dog

13.content:
Joy yawned as she woke up. School had been cancelled today so she was home with her father (Ben) and her older sister (Wendy).

Her father was 35 years old with brown hair and blue eyes. His wife had passed away one year ago due to a gave illness. He did his best to watch over his two children and worked hard at his job(at a restaurant as a cook) to the point where he didn’t get many chances to spend time with his children. He liked to explore in the woods near town, but he hates bugs a lot.

Joy’s sister, Wendy, was 17 years old with long ginger hair and blue eyes. Whenever her father wasn’t around, Wendy would take care of Joy. She likes to play with Joy a lot, even helping her pull pranks and jokes on others. Wendy loved to flirt with other boys, but hasn’t been on an actual date for a long time.

Joy got up and went to the door to find that Wendy had gotten to the door first. She walked up to her sister to see she was holding some sort of package.

“What is that?” Joy asked. Wendy shrugged and opened it to reveal a green GameCube. “Whoa, let’s play with it.” Joy said, excited. Wendy nodded and plugged it in. Once it was on, a female voice spoke on the screen.

“Greetings user. Congratulations on your new fantasy shrinking device. This version can make any Nintendo character appear at any size you wish. There is also a program to shrink yourself or others around you. Please select your choice user.”

“I think I know what it’s saying, but there is no way it could be real.” Wendy said.

“Come on! Let’s find out!” Joy said, looking through the different series. After a moment, she chose…
13.title: Two sisters with a new device

131.content: Joy fired up the first game she saw, with her sister peering over her shoulder out of curiosity. The cheerful GameCube jingle dotted about the screen, followed by an introduction screen for what looked like classic Zelda. It quickly dissolved into a character selection screen, where the girls could pick from
131.title: A Link in Size

14.content:
Violet sat up in bed and yawned. She turned to her husband(Josh) and smiled. He was still asleep and looked so peaceful.

Her husband was 48 years old with short brown hair and brown eyes. Josh loved video games and played them often. He also worked at a library and liked good stories. He brought his family to work often so they could get into the habit of reading.

Violet also had 2 kids, Tim and Samantha, both 15 years old. Tim had short black hair with brown eyes and Samantha had long brown hair with green eyes. The two kids loved doing things together and stuck by each other a lot. Though they didn’t work very hard in school, they still helped around the house, playing games as they worked like hide and seek.

Violet kissed her husband and climbed out of bed. She was still naked from last night’s fun, but she didn’t think it mattered since it was only 4:30 in the morning (which made her confused as to why someone rang the doorbell).

She went to the door and opened it a little. She didn’t see anyone, but there was a small package on the ground. She picked it up and brought it to the basement. Violet opened it to find it contained a green GameCube. The woman became confused as it didn’t see like a normal one. She plugged it into the tv that was in the basement and turned it on. Suddenly, a female voice spoke on the screen.

“Greetings user. Congratulations on your new fantasy shrinking device. This version can make any Nintendo character appear at any size you wish. There is also a program to shrink yourself or others around you. Please select your choice user.” Violet stared for a moment before giggling. She thought that this was just some sort of new game that Josh ordered and that it meant appear on the screen. Violet decided to go along with it, as she wanted to get better at video games for her husband.

She noticed the screen showed multiple series that she had to choose from. Though she wasn’t entirely familiar with them, she decided to pick…
14.title: A new player to the world of gaming

144.content: Violet decided to pick Kid Icarus as she knew it was one of Josh’s favorite games. The screen then showed the characters of the game. Though she didn’t recognize them, it provided a name and a title for them. Violet was interested at the different options. After a moment of looking through them, she chose…
144.title: Choosing a character of Kid Icarus

1442.content:
She looked at options carefully before picking the angel. She chose his height to be 6 inches. The machine buzzed and opened up a small slot at the top, raising an antenna out of it. The machine shot a laser that created the tiny character within seconds. Once it was done, the machine pulled the antenna back in and closed up.

Violet was astonished as she stared at the unconscious boy. She couldn’t believe the machine meant bringing the character to real life. She carefully picked Pit up and inspected him. He was so cute to her, making her giggle. Suddenly, Pit stirred and woke up.

“Lady Palutena? What’s going on?” He asked, stretching. He suddenly jumped at the sight of the naked giantess. “Ah! Who are you? Where’s Lady Palutena?” Pit asked. Violet giggled at his reaction.

“My name is Violet. I brought you here for some fun. Don’t worry about your goddess, she’s safe and sound at your home. You are just so cute by the way, especially with those small wings.” Violet said, carefully and lightly poking his left wing. Pit jumped, making her giggle. “How far can you fly with them?” Pit’s face turned red as he looked down.

“I…I can’t fly. Lady Palutena is the one who grants me the power of flight.” Pit said, embarrassed. The giantess frowned at him.

“Why can’t you fly?”

“That’s personal! Just let me go so I can return to Skyworld!” The giantess smiled and grabbed his feet, making him dangle. Pit started to get nervous at what the giant is planning.

“I think I’ll keep you. I’ll show you to my family a bit later, but for now I want you to be…
1442.title: The loyal servant of the goddess Palutena

1451.content: Okay, but there are a lot of fire emblem games so we have to dig deeper here.
1451.title: Fire Emblem

choices: Violet wants to get to know Morgan
Violet wants to play a game
Violet decides to put on some clothes
Violet tries to summon other people
145111.content:
After a bit of time of searching Violet selected a character.

Much to her surprise a young boy with blue hair and a fancy coat appeared on the floor, he was only an inch tall.

"Huh, where am I? Where's mom?" The boy asked, Violet couldn't help but coo, this boy was definitely a momma's boy.

He heard the cooing and looked up and saw Violet. He reacted just like a normal person would when they see a giant naked MILF. He ran and screamed with a blushing face.

However Violet easily grabbed him. "Hi there cutie, what's your name?" Violet asked, the boy whimpered before answering "M-m-morgan."

"I'm Violet, don't worry I'm not going to hurt you, not at all." Violet assures stroking his head.

What now?
145111.title: Tactical Shota

info.brief_description: Use a game console to bring Nintendo characters into the real world at different sizes
info.description:
Your character wakes up one day to find that they received a package from their good friend, Nick. They open it up to find out it's a GameCube, but this one is unique. When plugged in and turned on, it has the power to bring any character from Nintendo into the real world at different sizes. It also has the ability to shrink down the user if they so choose.

Rules
No scat
No watersports
Try to get at least a paragraph (unless itâs a choice chapter)
Try to keep it in 3rd person
Characters from Nintendo Videogames, books, and shows are allowed

Also, as long as the character was on a Nintendo game or a Nintendo System, itâs allowed

Everything else is allowed

Starting characters
Damon (16 years old)= A kind boy with short brown hair and green eyes who loves video games and works hard in school. He has a lot of friends and likes to befriend new people. He lives with his mother and has one older sister.

Shadow (39 years old)= A hard working man with short black hair and brown eyes who lives alone. He works well with others but likes to act as if others are inferior to him, and can be a bit creepy at times.

Joy (10 years old)= A playful girl with short ginger hair and two pigtails. She likes to be mischievous and likes to ignore something she's told to do. She lives with her father and her older sister.

Violet (50 years old)= A mother of two children with short black hair and green eyes. She has a loving husband and two children. Though she doesn't really understand video games, she tries her best playing them because her husband is really into them. Violet is a good cook and always likes finding new ways to play.



Extreme thanks to Triplestories for helping make this possible (Most of the credit goes to him as this interactive shares the same universe as his interactive "The Great Disney Shrink Collection")
